name: Olivier Sirot
summary: QA-QC Lead with 10 years of oil & gas and automotive industry experience, focused on project management and supplier quality. Proven ability to lead quality assurance/quality control activities across design, procurement, onshore and offshore phases, coordinating multi-disciplinary teams and major clients (TOTAL, TECHNIP, EXXON, ADMA-OPCO).

experience.title: Project Lead QA-QC Engineer
experience.description: Led QA-QC activities for Erha North (EXXON), Clov (TOTAL), and Block 15 (EXXON); managed QC for packages including Buoyancy Foam, Connectors, clamps, structures, Subsea Valves and Forged Flanges; supervised inspectors; reviewed NCRs and MRB; coordinated with HSEQ; contributed to on-site quality assurance.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Project Manager for Umm Lulu and Zakum Electrification projects (ADMA-OPCO); oversaw onshore/offshore activities, planning, cost control, and scheduling; prepared technical and commercial offers; led contract execution and coordination; managed ~25 engineers and subcontractors; ensured successful project completion.

experience.title: Supplier Quality Control Engineer
experience.description: Managed 15 suppliers; participated in supplier selection; prepared validation plans; validated supplier components; conducted homologation and supplier audits; ensured quality of bought components.

experience.title: Supplier Quality Management Engineer
experience.description: Ensured PCB quality at supplier in China; monitored notifications and quality alerts; managed defective parts with 8D; implemented containment actions; conducted supplier visits and corrective actions; assisted in process/part validation.

experience.title: Purchasing Engineer
experience.description: Buyer for radiator production machine; managed orders, delivery schedules and incoming inspection; organized efficient incoming inspection; negotiated shortest delivery times with suppliers.

experience.title: Supplier Quality Control (Trainee)
experience.description: Managed 25 suppliers; led homologation of 66 components; developed tools and procedures for efficient quality control and defect reporting.

experience.title: Validation Engineer
experience.description: Participated in product validation for panels for PSA; coordinated testing requirements; contributed to interface tooling improvements; supported traceability, reporting and cross-functional communication.

certifications.name: IRCA Certificate for Quality Management Auditor
